statements: SELECT name FROM contacts WHERE ANY child.age > 14 AND child.gender = "m" OVER child IN children END
SELECT name FROM contacts WHERE ANY child.age > 14 OVER child IN children END
SELECT name FROM contacts WHERE ANY child.age > 14 OVER child IN children END AND ANY hobby = "golf" OVER hobby IN hobbies END
SELECT title FROM catalog WHERE ANY director OVER director IN details.director END
SELECT details.director FROM catalog  GROUP BY details.director HAVING ANY director OVER director IN details.director END
SELECT asin FROM catalog WHERE dimensions.height > 1 and ANY gen = "Thriller" OVER gen IN details.genre END
